person.persName: Anderson C. Eversole (Perry County, KY, laborer and soldier )

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Eversole and Sallie Bowling Eversole. Married to Jane Eversole. Father of Belle Eversole. Resident of Perry County in 1860. Laborer in Perry County in 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private and sergeant from December 24, 1862 to March 24, 1864.
